players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Bob was a good guy, I'm sad he's gone."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found him to be the mafioso. Trust my findings."

Diana: "Let's work together to uncover the truth. I've identified Charlie as the mafioso based on my investigation, and Alice believes Bob was innocent. We should discuss our findings and strategies."
